extendedInfo.description: Gift Card Balance helps you check the live balance of your gift cards (USA Edition). Enter the gift card number and pin/ref, then the balance will be displayed. Previous cards are stored, you can re-check the card easily later on.The app is providing a simple and accurate way to help you track card balances. The balance query is done by connecting to the site of your card provider and retrieving the balance. The application does not collect any personal information from your phone. The stored card info is sent to your card provider only.Currently, these 74 gift cards are fully supported:-American Eagle Outfitters-Americas Taco Shop-Applebee-Babies R Us-Barnes and Noble-Bartell Drugs-Bed Bath and Beyond-Best Buy-Block Buster-Bloomingdales-Boston Market-Brinker Restaurants-Brookstone-Burlington Coat Factory-Champs Sports-Chilis Restaurants-Cinemark-Culvers-CVS Pharmacy-Dairy Queen US-Darden Restaurants-Dell-DSW-Exxon Mobil-Forever 21-Game Stop-Gibsons Bar and Steakhouse-Home Depot-Hugos Frog Bar and Fish House-Islands Restaurants-Izzys Online-JC Penney-Kmart-Kohl-Landrys Inc-Lettuce Entertain You-Lowes-Luxbar-Macys-Maggianos Little Italy-McCormick and Schmicks -McDonalds-Mens Wearhouse-Mimis Caf-Neiman Marcus-Office Depot-Old Navy-Outback-PacSun-Papa Murphys-Peets Coffee and Tea-PF Changs-Pizza Fresh Take N Bake-Pizza Hut-Pottery Barn-Qdoba-Quartino Ristorante-Redbox-Regal Entertainment Group-REI-Ritasice-Sears-Shell-Soma Intimates-Starbucks-Taco Time-Target-The Limited-Toys R Us-ULTA-Victoria Secret-Walmart-Wendys-Whole FoodsThese 13 gift cards are under development due to lack of card info:-7-Eleven-Adidas-American Airlines-Bravo Brio Restaurant-Burger King Crown-Cheesecake Factory-Cold Stone Creamery-Dominos-Lands End-Marriott -Ocharleys-Payless Shoe Source-T.J.MaxxAndroid app permission requirements and explanations:[Internet] the app talks to your card provider to retrieve card balance in real time.[Storage Access] the gift card data is stored in your SD card so that you can easily query again.[Phone Call] Some card providers does not support online query, the app lets you call them directly.[Camera] You can submit your supported card by taking a photo and send to developer.
